author: Reuters
title: China's Wuhan marks sombre Tomb Sweeping festival amid coronavirus
description: China bans tomb sweeping activities connected with the festival till April 30
content:
April 4 Each year for the tomb sweeping festival, Wuhan resident Dai Jinfeng drives with her mother to a nearby cemetery to pay respects to their ancestors. The coronavirus has changed that ritual this year.
Also known as Qingming, the festival, which falls … [+3133 chars]
